Articles.Content: I am pretty sure I installed this correctly because I used CKAN. All of the icons on the map and the toolbar appear to just be black. I can't think of anything I am doing wrong. Please assist me in this epic voyage. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thank you

Are you using Active Texture Management?... or any other texture affecting mod?...If so, IIRC, you have to exclude the Kerbinside textures... IIRC, there is an exclusion list .cfg for ATM that has Kerbinside listed... Check either the Kerbinside thread, or the ATM thread... (I'm pretty sure its in the Kerbinside thread, tho)

EDIT: Actually, it looks like the ATM exclusion .cfg you need is listed in the OP of the KerbalKonstructs thread. Also, it looks like using CKAN to install Kerbal Kontructs does NOT install a required folder for kerbinSide...

Reference the first few posts of this page of the KerbinSide thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785-1-0-2-Kerbin-Side-v0-41-Version-This!/page133](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785-1-0-2-Kerbin-Side-v0-41-Version-This!/page133)

here's the KK release thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105247](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105247)
